TEXT.TITLE: CBOE MEMBERSHIP SEAT SELLS FOR RECORD HIGH
TEXT.BODY: A membership seat on the Chicago Board Options Exchange (CBOE) sold for a record 342,000 dlrs Friday, the exchange said today. The previous record price of 308,000 dlrs was set on February 17. The current bid for a CBOE seat is 315,000 dlrs and the offer is 345,000 dlrs. Reuter
